Compare Cream Blinds

Voile FR Sandshell Cream Roller Blind (Swift directblinds)

Our Voile FR fabrics look beautiful up due to their translucent properties in a wide array of neutral shades.  Durable and stylish, this translucent cream roller blind allows the light to filter through and is hand-washable. This cream roller blind is ideal for kitchens as it's flame-retardant. At Swift Direct Blinds, quality is important to us, which is why your new voile roller blind is made by our expert team in our Yorkshire workshop, and comes with customer-1st service! Stockholm Cream Roller Blind (Swift directblinds)

Stockholm Cream is a beautiful neutral colour, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder & great for injecting colour into any room. Our Stockholm Cream roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms.  Our Roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe.  As with all our made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind. Stirlo Oyster Cream (Blinds By Post)

Stirlo Oyster Cream Plain Roller Blind The Stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room.  The fabric is composed of 100% Polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with White chain used as standard, or a Nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If   the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on our professional discretion. Made to Measure Stirlo Oyster Cream Roller Blind | Privacy, Dim-Out Fabric | blindsbypost

from £7.72

ThermoBlock Blackout Cream Roller Blind (Swift directblinds)

Our exclusive ThermoBlock range features soft neutral colours, on a polyester based blackout fabric. A cream roller blind easily brightens up the space. Our ThermoBlock range is made from blackout fabric, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. This cream blackout roller has a silver UV-reflecting backing, meaning your rooms are kept cool in summer and warm in winter, which means this roller is also great for hot offices or sunrooms.  Roller blinds bring a contemporary and modern look to the space, and as all our blinds are child-safe, our roller blinds can be installed anywhere in the house! At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously. Konya Blackout Butter Cream (Blinds By Post)

Konya Blackout Butter Cream Plain Roller Blind The Konya range boasts a huge range of blackout and thermal fabrics to use in any room. The fabric is composed of 100% Polyester, with a PVC blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with White chain used as standard, or a Nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If both the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on our professional discretion. Eco Friendly FR Cream Recycled Roller Blind (Swift directblinds)

Our Eco-Friendly, recycled roller blinds are made from 100% PET recycled waste. This means that you can decorate your window with your new sustainable blind, and contribute positively to the environment! For every Sq. Metre of fabric, 9 PET bottles are used, so you'll be positively contributing to the fight on plastic pollution, as well as getting a stylish blind! Made with a moisture-resistant and flame-retardant coating, your new white roller blind can be just the thing to complete your bathroom or kitchen. White doesnt have to mean stark. Infusion asc Cream Perfect Fit (Blinds By Post)

Infusion asc Cream Perfect Fit Pleated Blind. Part of our Infusion asc range, where Advanced Solar Control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The ‘ASC’ refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the Summer and retaining heat in the Winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.  This fabric will still allow light into the room, but giving full privacy when inside from outside. This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, uPVC windows and doors. The blind is fixed by brackets which sit between the black rubber bead and the glass, they simply slide in when installing - taking minutes per blind to fit and keeping the window guarantee!  This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through. These can be seen on our range of images above.  If you would prefer the wires to be hidden, please take a look at our 'Hive' or 'Luna' ranges.  Made to measure Infusion ASC Cream Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX4102. Our Infusion range allows in natural light but has the added benefit of having an advanced solar coating which improves energy efficiency

from £20.38
cream cream-perfect-fit perfect-fit

Autumn Wood Butterscotch Curtain (Swift directblinds)

Vitra Blackout Cream Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra (Swift directblinds)

Vitra Blackout is one of our most popular blackout fabrics.  In several fresh, bright shades, this fabric is a  great way for you to upgrade your skylight window at a value cost. This option comes with sleek, modern Aluminium framework. This blackout fabric has a colour match backing and provides up to 20% heat loss reduction. Voile FR Sandshell Cream Panel Blind (Swift directblinds)

Our Voile FR fabrics look beautiful up due to their translucent properties in a wide array of neutral shades. Durable and stylish, this translucent cream panel blind allows the light to filter through and is hand-washable. This cream panel is ideal for kitchens as it's flame-retardant. Panel blinds are great for covering large spans of glass or as window dividers due to their large widths and drops.  One of the largest blinds we products at 5 metres width and over 3 metres drop, panel blinds are a modern take on traditional vertical blinds, and are just as stylish when up. At Swift Direct Blinds, quality is important to us, which is why your new voile panel blind is made by our expert team in our Yorkshire workshop, and comes with customer-1st service! Bella Blackout Cream Panel Blind (Swift directblinds)

Simple, soft and warm, our Bella Blackout Cream panel blind blends minimal style with practical design.  A firm favourite, our Bella Blackout fabrics come in a wide array of colours and blind types to suit any room - Whether its blackout panel blinds in the bedroom,  in the kitchen or study, these blackout fabrics are durable and value for money.  Panel blinds are great being used to create sections in large spaces, as they can be top fixed to ceilings and can span up to a massive 5 metres width and 3 metres drop! At Swift Direct Blind, quality comes first.  Our panel blinds are expertly cut and assembled by our panel blinds team, with over 50 years of making blinds and curtains, not only do our blinds come with a quality finish, we provide a free five year guarantee on this product. Eco Friendly FR Cream Panel Blind (Swift directblinds)

Our Eco-Friendly, recycled panel blinds are made from 100% PET recycled waste.  This means that you can decorate your window with your new sustainable blind, and contribute positively to the environment! For every Sq. Metre of fabric, 9 PET bottles are used, so you'll be positively contributing to the fight on plastic pollution, as well as getting a stylish blind! Made with a moisture-resistant and flame-retardant coating, your new cream roller blind can be just the thing to complete your bathroom or kitchen.  Cream panel blinds are a fantastic way to add warm back into your room, whilst still staying in the neutral colour palette.  Panel blinds are fantastic as room dividers or for large panes of glass due to their large size, up to 5 metres width and 3 metres drop! At Swiftdirectblinds, quality is paramount, which is why not only do our hand-made panel blinds come with customer-first service, they now come with a five-year guarantee for extra peace of mind! Luna Blackout Parchment Cream Perfect Fit (Blinds By Post)

Luna Blackout Parchment Cream Perfect Fit Pleated Blind. Part of our Luna Blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, UPVC windows and doors. The "Luna Blackout" range has a   backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: Yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame. Made to measure Luna Blackout Parchment Cream Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX72001. A contemporary blackout blind produced in a honeycomb pleated fabric providing thermal and increasing energy efficiency.

Splash Oyster Electric Roller Blind (Swift directblinds)

The Splash Oyster electric roller blind is a very light, natural cream colour.  This neutral tone will work well in most spaces and look beautiful when matched with woods throughout the home. Electric roller blinds are perfect for more hard to reach windows and as they are completely cord free they are inherently child safe.  This will also add a very modern feel when window dressing, particularly when paired with our Smart Hub (sold seperately).  As with all our made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind giving extra peace of mind that you are investing in a product that will stand the test of time. Our best-selling Splash range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish which has wonderful light filtering properties.  Perfect for offering privacy without completely blocking out all the light.  Our Splash range is also moisture resistant making it a perfect addition within for kitchens, bathrooms and en-suites.  This Splash Dove Grey electric roller blind will update and brighten any interior. The soft grey tone of the fabric will look stunning when paired with natural wooden tones and is the perfect splash of colour to compliment cool, contemporary grey shades. Our electric rollers are inherently child safe as they require no cords to operate & electric roller blinds are perfect for more dificult to reach windows as they can be operated with a remote control. They also introduce an exceptionally modern feel within the space. Marlow Blackout Ivory Electric Roller Blind (Swift directblinds)

Marlow Blackout is a sophisticated fabric with quite earthy tones. It has a blackout feature that gives you complete control over the light coming into your room. This attractive blackout roller blind in white colour is the great way to add more style to any room. The electric feature makes it easy to use and ideal for windows that are difficult to reach. Versailles Blackout Ivory Electric Roller Blind (Swift directblinds)

Versailles Blackout Ivory is a charming, classical electric blind with metallic textured pattern that gives it a premium finish. In the softest ivory, it gives rooms an airy feel and adds some real luxury to a window. Crafted with blackout material, it won’t allow light to enter into your room when closed and the electrical operation makes it easy to operate. The blind is also treated with Pollergen™, this neutralises pollen so it doesn’t disturb hayfever sufferers. Pair your electric roller blinds with the Smart Hub and operate your blinds with your Amazon Alexa or with Google Home.
